title: Setup
description: Configure how the playground processes billing operations.

firstTime.title: First time here?
firstTime.description: Start with Mock mode - it simulates all billing operations locally without needing any API keys. Perfect for learning how QZPay works.

paymentMode.title: Payment Mode
paymentMode.description: Choose how billing operations are processed. You can change this anytime.

mock.title: Mock
mock.description: Simulates everything locally. No API keys needed, instant responses.

stripe.title: Stripe Test
stripe.description: Uses real Stripe Test Mode API. Requires sk_test_* key.

mercadopago.title: MercadoPago
mercadopago.description: Uses MercadoPago Sandbox. Requires TEST access token.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Enter your test/sandbox API credentials. These are stored locally in your browser.

stripe.label: Stripe Secret Key
stripe.help: Find this in your <link>Stripe Dashboard → API Keys</link> (make sure you're in Test Mode)

mercadopago.label: MercadoPago Access Token
mercadopago.help: Find this in your <link>MercadoPago Developers Panel</link> → Your Application → Credentials

testCards.title: Test Cards Reference
testCards.description: Use these card numbers when simulating payments. Any expiry date and CVC will work.

createPlans.title: Create Plans
createPlans.description: Go to Catalog → Plans to define your subscription tiers

addPrices.title: Add Prices
addPrices.description: Go to Catalog → Prices to set pricing for your plans

createCustomers.title: Create Customers
createCustomers.description: Go to Simulate → Customers to create test customers

subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Go to Simulate → Subscriptions to subscribe customers to plans

templates.title: Quick Start Templates
templates.description: Load a pre-configured template to explore different billing scenarios instantly.

saasBasic.name: SaaS Basic
saasBasic.description: Classic B2B SaaS with Free, Pro, and Enterprise tiers

apiDeveloper.name: API / Developer
apiDeveloper.description: Usage-based API pricing for developer products

ecommerceBox.name: E-commerce Box
ecommerceBox.description: Subscription box model with monthly deliveries

freemium.name: Freemium
freemium.description: Free tier with optional paid upgrades

simulation.title: Simulation Behavior
simulation.description: Control how the playground simulates billing operations.

autoProcessPayments.label: Auto-process Payments
autoProcessPayments.help: When enabled, payments are processed instantly. Disable to manually control payment processing.

webhookDelay.label: Webhook Delay
webhookDelay.help: Add artificial delay to simulated events to mimic real webhook behavior.

failureRate.label: Payment Failure Rate
failureRate.help: Percentage of payments that will randomly fail. Useful for testing error handling.

trialAutoConvert.label: Auto-convert Trials
trialAutoConvert.help: Automatically convert trial subscriptions to paid when trial ends.

display.title: Display Preferences
display.description: Customize how data is displayed throughout the playground.

showFullIds.label: Show Full IDs
showFullIds.help: Display complete IDs instead of truncated versions.

defaults.title: Default Values
defaults.description: Set default values for new entities created in the playground.

currency.label: Default Currency
currency.help: Currency used when creating new prices.

billingInterval.label: Default Billing Interval
billingInterval.help: Default billing cycle for new prices.

trialDays.label: Default Trial Days
trialDays.help: Default trial period for new prices (0 = no trial).

invoiceDaysUntilDue.label: Invoice Days Until Due
invoiceDaysUntilDue.help: Default number of days until invoices are due.
